nl.uva.science.wsdtf.utilities
Class Options

java.lang.Object
  nl.uva.science.wsdtf.utilities.Options

public class Options
extends Object

The Class Options. This class is used as an argument in almost every other class. It contains data members, such as the protocol the client and the server will use. Specific protocol configurations also go here. Every implementation of this class must provide a URI, for specifying the server location, and the port that client and server will communicate on. This class also provide a vector for storing URIs, that specify file locations, something that can be used by the producing WS to publish file locations to the consuming WS.

Author:
S. Koulouzis

Options

public Options(int protocol,
               SocketAddress socketAddress)
Instantiates a new options with the protocol the port and the server location. The server location is used to inform the client by its WS where to find the server

Parameters:
protocol - the protocol
port - the port
serverLocation - the server location
